scripts.build: lerna exec --ignore example --ignore *powerfulyang.com -- npm run build
scripts.start:dev:api: lerna exec --scope api.powerfulyang.com -- npm run start:dev
scripts.start:dev:admin: lerna exec --scope admin.powerfulyang.com -- npm run start:dev
scripts.watch:example: lerna exec --scope example -- npm run storybook
scripts.fix:home:style: lerna exec --scope powerfulyang.com -- npm run fix:style
scripts.precommit: npm run prettier && npm run lint && npm run fix:components:style
